articles.title: I got a glimpse of future Android smartphones - here are 3 major upgrades you ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Qualcomm's new Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset will power new Android experiences.

articles.title: Sculpted by Aimee shoppers can finally get their hands on game changer product
articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.summary: Sculpted by Aimee has launched Cream Cushion, a compact foundation featuring Longwear Polymers, Niacinamide, and Glycerin. The product provides customisable coverage and skin benefits, available for €32 online.

articles.title: Haunting PS5 shooter Saros launches in March
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: GoPro is launching the Fluid Pro AI, a versatile handheld camera stabilizer compatible with GoPro cameras like the Hero13 Black, smartphones, and compact cameras. Available on October 21st for $229.99, it offers a 400-gram payload capacity and improved battery life compared to competitors like the Insta360 Flow 2 Pro and DJI Osmo Mobile 7 Pro.

articles.title: Mad Unicorn out to win Thai brands a global presence
articles.author: Suchit Leesa-nguansuk
articles.summary: Komsan Lee, founder of Flash Group, is launching Mad Unicorn to help Thai brands reach global consumers, utilizing Flash Express's infrastructure. Additionally, Thai President Foods, along with Komsan Lee and Ananda Development, established Thai President Beverage Co Ltd, which acquired a majority stake in Chagee Thailand, a premium tea brand. Chagee will also invest in R&D for Thai tea leaves in Thailand to go global.

articles.title: IKONDESA , Platform To Market Products Of KKDW Entrepreneurs
articles.author: BERNAMA
org: Ministry of Rural and Regional Development
articles.summary: The Ministry of Rural and Regional Development launched IKONDESA, a strategic market access platform for rural products made by entrepreneurs. IKONDESA aims to empower rural micro, small, and medium enterprises by providing physical sales centers in city centers and expanding into digital markets, including e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: Flipkart starts new exchange program, instant mobile swaps, AI-powered pricing and more amid BBD sale. Check details
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Flipkart has expanded its exchange program across 26 product categories, utilizing an AI system for quick device evaluation. They've also launched smartphone exchanges via Flipkart Minutes, becoming India's first platform for instant mobile swaps through quick commerce. The company is improving its ReCommerce system with AI-powered pricing and image authentication.

articles.title: New Mario Kart World update has just made free roam a whole lot better
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Nintendo released a new update. This update provides enhancements or new features to their existing products or services.

articles.title: PlayStation State of Play September 2025: all the news and trailers
articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.summary: GoPro has announced the Fluid Pro AI, a new handheld camera stabilizer compatible with GoPro devices like the Hero13 Black, smartphones, and some compact cameras. The Fluid Pro AI will be available on October 21st at a price of $229.99.

articles.title: Masterstroke by this company that plans to create AI ice creams with less calories and..., here's all you need to know
articles.author: Vaishali Shastri
articles.summary: Magnum Ice Cream Company (TMICC) has partnered with the AI startup NotCo AI to develop new ice cream and frozen dessert products. NotCo AI's 'Giuseppe AI' platform will assist Magnum in creating new flavors, managing nutritional content, producing plant-based ice creams, and optimizing manufacturing costs.

articles.title: I'm in my 40s, and No7's beauty advent calendars are perfect for mature skin
articles.author: Sabine Wiesel
articles.summary: No7 has launched two beauty advent calendars for the Christmas season: the 'No7 25 days of beauty advent calendar' and the 'No7 ultimate beauty advent calendar'. The calendars feature a selection of anti-ageing skincare and makeup products, including items from the new pro artist range, with the latter calendar containing 25 full-sized products worth over £530.

articles.title: ServiceTitan Unveils Major Product Expansions Across AI, Financial Tools, Construction, and CRM ...
articles.author: Service Titan
articles.summary: ServiceTitan announced a suite of new product capabilities at Pantheon 2025, focusing on automation, AI, financial tools, innovations in commercial service, construction management improvements, and a brand new CRM experience. These launches aim to improve outcomes for contractors and their customers across various trades.

articles.title: Laptops with the best battery life just got "legendary" power upgrade
articles.author: Mike Lowe
articles.summary: Qualcomm has revealed its Snapdragon X2 Elite chips, including X2 Elite and X2 Elite Extreme, promising improved performance for laptops. Featuring Qualcomm's latest Oryon CPU with up to 5GHz frequency, the new chips aim to deliver multi-day battery life and enhanced performance in day-to-day tasks, graphics, and AI.

articles.title: ServiceTitan Unveils Major Product Expansions Across AI, Financial Tools, Construction, and CRM at Pantheon 2025 - ServiceTitan (NASDAQ:TTAN)
articles.author: Benzinga
articles.summary: ServiceTitan unveiled new product announcements at Pantheon 2025. The new capabilities span automation, AI, financial tools, innovations in commercial service, and improvements in construction management. ServiceTitan also launched a new service.

articles.title: The AI-Powered Creative Revolution in Social Media • MassisPost
articles.author: Massis Post
articles.summary: Several companies are leveraging generative AI tools to enhance their marketing and content creation processes. Oxa uses Gemini for campaign templates and social posts, while Three Fold Noodles + Dumpling employs Gemini in Docs for social media content. Sprinklr integrates Sprinklr AI+ into its platform for enhanced customer experience, and Salesforce launched Einstein GPT for automating content generation in CRM.

articles.title: New Stuff Alert: Ganni Snoafers and Blood-Orange Ghia
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: Ghia launched Blood Orange Le Spritz, while New Balance introduced Ganni-treated 1906L snoafers. Coyuchi has released their 'first-ever complete baby collection' named Coyuchi Littles consisting of  crib sheets, quilts, towels, and blankets.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Expands Product Portfolio with Several New SKUs in Collaboration with North American OCS Partner  Sep. 24, 2025 20:03
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations Inc. has launched four new coffee SKUs, including a seasonal pumpkin-flavored coffee pod, in partnership with a North American distributor. They have already produced and distributed six pallets of the pumpkin SKU across the U.S. and Canadian markets and are developing three additional flavors: decaf, vanilla, and bananas foster.

articles.title: Aldi's Dramatic Refresh Is Hitting Stores Soon—Here's What You Can Expect
articles.author: Cristine Struble
articles.summary: Aldi is updating the packaging of its private label products to prominently feature the Aldi brand name, either as 'Aldi brand' or 'an ALDI Original'. This refresh aims to streamline the shopping experience and reinforce consumer trust in Aldi's value, quality, and commitment. The products and recipes themselves are not changing, only the packaging design.

articles.title: 4 rumored Amazon products that have me truly excited for the September 30 event
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon is anticipated to unveil new devices at its upcoming Devices and Services event. These potential products include new Echo speakers, Fire TVs, and possibly a color version of the Kindle Scribe.

articles.title: In the Face of the Absurd and Hysterical Hostility of the Empire, the Cuban People Embrace their Venezuelan Brother
articles.author: Glenda Flores Solano
articles.summary: Apple announced the release of the iPhone 15, featuring a faster A17 Bionic chip and an improved 48MP camera system. They also unveiled Apple Fitness+ Premium, a subscription service offering personalized workout plans and premium content. Pre-orders for the iPhone 15 begin this Friday, with availability on September 22nd.

articles.title: AI Is Reshaping Marketing by Reframing Decision-Making
articles.author: Humphrey Ho
articles.summary: Forge developed Sorano, a platform designed to give marketing teams the ability to perform complex comparative analyses across markets, brands, geographies, and timeframes in real time. It simplifies the decision-making process by using existing datasets, predictive models, and generative AI to turn raw inputs into business-ready insights. Tools like Sorano provide one interface, adding capabilities like reporting analysts, insights managers, data entry, account coordinators, project managers, and producers.

articles.title: Google Launches SMB Resource Center Focused on AI
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google has launched a new Small Business Hub, a mini-site, to help SMBs understand and use AI tools. This hub includes overviews of Google's business tools, AI and data tools, and tips on how to use them, aiming to maximize opportunities for SMBs.

articles.title: Deli opens another Kansas City location with sandwiches, sweet tea and more
articles.author: Jenna Thompson
articles.summary: McAlister's Deli is opening its third location in the Kansas City area, specifically in Blue Springs. The grand opening will occur on Monday, and the first 100 customers who are rewards members will receive a free club sandwich every week for a year.

articles.title: Early fall Prime Day deals are already available in Canada
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting Prime Big Deal Days from October 7-10, offering discounts on various products for Prime members. Featured brands include Ninja, Samsung, Dyson, and Levi's, with deals on items like vacuum cleaners, air purifiers (LEVOIT Core 300), and air fryers (COSORI 6.8Qt). Shoppers can prepare by signing up for Prime, building their cart early, and setting up deal notifications.

articles.title: Evolving Beyond the App Store: The Future as a Discovery Platform
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: WeChat, a company with over 1.3 billion monthly active users, exemplifies the super app model. Originally a messaging app, it has evolved into an extensive platform offering mobile payments and other diverse services.

articles.title: This popular audio brand is launching $1,200 'sculptural' earbuds that could shake up the market
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Bang & Olufsen has launched new premium earbuds featuring an ambitious design and high audio quality. However, the reviewer expresses some concerns regarding the product.

articles.title: A Complete Guide to the Best Electric Makeup Brush Cleaner in 2025
articles.author: David Shawn
articles.summary: Automatic makeup brush cleaners are introduced as a time-saving and effective solution for cleaning makeup brushes. They use a motorized spinning motion with a cleaning solution to quickly wash and dry brushes, ensuring thorough cleaning and instant usability. These cleaners are presented as a modern beauty tool that promotes hygiene and prolongs the life of makeup brushes.

articles.title: LG's 2025 HOME APPLIANCE LINEUP EMPHASIZES INTUITIVE DESIGN AND SMART TECHNOLOGY
articles.author: Dayang Norazhar
articles.summary: LG Electronics Canada, Inc. has launched new home appliances including the LG Counter-Depth MAX™ Refrigerator, LG Smart Induction Range with Air Fry, LG WashTower® with Heat Pump Dryer, and LG WashCombo™ All-in-One Washer/Dryer. These appliances feature smart technology, sleek aesthetics, and are designed to enhance convenience and efficiency for Canadian households.

articles.title: Glow Season Starts Now: Radiate with Dermacell
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: Dermacell introduces its skincare line designed to provide hydration, rejuvenation, and glow-enhancing benefits. Infused with ingredients like Aleo Ferox, Salicylic Acid, Essential Oils and Vitamins, Dermacell products aim to nourish the skin, offering deep hydration, glow boosting, and anti-aging & firming properties. The brand emphasizes a simplified skincare routine for radiant skin.

articles.title: The Complete Guide to Baby Bottle Brushes and Electric Bottle Cleaners
articles.author: David Shawn
articles.summary: The article introduces two product types for cleaning baby bottles: baby bottle brushes and electric bottle cleaners. Baby bottle brushes offer flexibility and portability, while electric bottle cleaners provide efficiency and thoroughness by automating the cleaning, sterilizing, and drying of multiple bottles at once.

articles.title: Flipkart starts new exchange program, instant mobile swaps, AI-powered pricing and more amid BBD sale. Check details
articles.author: Trending Desk
articles.summary: Flipkart has introduced an expanded exchange program covering 26 product categories to ease customer upgrades of electronics and appliances. The program features cross-category exchanges and utilizes an AI system for quick device evaluation. Additionally, Flipkart has launched smartphone exchanges via Flipkart Minutes, offering instant mobile swaps, and is growing its SellBack program, which allows customers to sell their old phones.

articles.title: Alia Bhatt headlines Gucci event at Milan Fashion Week wearing dramatic La Famiglia coat
articles.author: Pooja Pillai
articles.summary: South Asian beauty brands such as Kulfi and Kay Beauty are launching in the UK, offering products like concealers and kajals designed for deeper skin tones. These launches are driven by the demand from the South Asian diaspora and aim to provide inclusive beauty options in mainstream retail spaces.

articles.title: Argos shoppers praise Vax carpet cleaner that gives 'impressive' results
articles.author: Eve Wagstaff
articles.summary: Vax has introduced the SpotWash Duo, a portable spot cleaner designed for carpets, upholstery, and car interiors. The product features a lightweight design, interchangeable cleaning tools, and separate clean and dirty water tanks. Customer feedback indicates positive results in cleaning carpets, car seats and pushchairs.

articles.title: Google Fuchsia OS: What's the story so far
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Google is developing a new operating system intended as a potential replacement for Android and Chrome OS.

articles.title: Flipkart announces new exchange program for mobiles, electronics, and large appliances
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Flipkart has introduced an expanded exchange program covering 26 product categories, featuring a new AI-driven screening process for quick device evaluation and cross-category exchanges. The program aims to provide instant value for old products, improve affordability, and allow upgrades across personal tech and home appliances via the Flipkart platform.

articles.title: No Pixel 10 Needed: Google Photos' Conversational Editing Comes To All Android Devices
articles.author: Paul Monckton
articles.summary: Google Photos has introduced a new 'conversational editing' feature powered by Gemini AI, allowing users to edit photos using spoken or typed commands.  The feature, initially available to Android users in the U.S., enables users to make specific edits or add new elements to photos using generative AI.  Users can access the feature by tapping 'Help me edit' in Google Photos.

articles.title: Google launches Search Live AI feature in English in U.S.
articles.author: Tip Ranks
articles.summary: Google has officially launched Search Live in English in the U.S. within the Google app. Search Live allows users to have interactive voice conversations in AI Mode and share their camera feed, enabling real-time question responses and visual context-based search.

articles.title: NuStartz Joins CrafterCMS Solution Partner Program to Accelerate Scalable Digital Experiences
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: NuStartz has joined the CrafterCMS Solution Partner Program to deliver digital experiences, leveraging CrafterCMS's headless CMS platform. This partnership enables clients to rapidly build and scale digital products, creating sustainable competitive advantage through agile product development, advanced content management, and AI-powered digital experience strategies.

articles.title: AI See & Help: Real-Time Visual Assistance
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google has launched Search Live, an AI-powered visual search feature integrated into Google Search and Lens, available for U.S. Android and iPhone users. This feature allows users to ask questions about objects their phone camera sees, receiving real-time answers and guidance. DeepMind's Project Astra contributes to the development of robust AI vision models for Search Live.

articles.title: Is the free offer so easy to use for a teenager and her parents?
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Revolut launched 'Young Account,' a new digital wallet service designed for teenagers with parental oversight. It allows parents to have real-time visibility into their teen's spending and control, while teens can make online payments and analyze spending habits. The account is free and comes with a Mastercard, providing a safe environment for teens to learn about budgeting and saving.

articles.title: Aldi's Private Label Products — Like ‘Red Bag Chicken' — Are Getting a New Look
articles.author: Chrissy Callahan
articles.summary: Aldi is refreshing its packaging and adding its name to all private-label products, creating an 'Aldi Original' endorsement. This move aims to simplify the shopping experience, with brands like Simply Nature and Clancy's receiving modernized branding. The changes will occur over the next few years.

articles.title: Braze Named a Leader in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Multichannel Marketing Hubs for Third Consecutive Year
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Braze, a customer engagement platform, has been named a Leader in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for Multichannel Marketing Hubs. This recognition underscores Braze's commitment to personalized, AI-powered experiences and continuous product development, including OfferFit acquisition, BrazeAI™ expansion, and support for the Braze Data Platform. The company is focused on enabling marketers to improve customer engagement programs and deliver strong business outcomes.

articles.title: Tide Makes the Biggest Upgrade to Its Liquid Detergent in 20 Years with Its Most Advanced Formula Yet
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide is launching an upgraded formula for its Original Liquid Detergent in September 2025. The new formula features a 25% increase in cleaning surfactants for stain removal and 40% more non-ionic surfactants to combat body soils and odors. This enhanced formula will be available at the same price as the previous version.

articles.title: Google is starting to launch real-time AI voice search
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Google is launching Search Live in the US, an AI-powered feature that lets users search for information through conversational interactions within the Google app on Android and iOS. This new feature responds to questions in real-time and provides relevant web links, and can incorporate camera input for visual searches.

articles.title: AI-native e-commerce platform Genstore secures $10 million in seed funding
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Genstore, an AI-native store builder, completed a $10 million seed funding round led by Weimob. Genstore allows merchants to launch online stores in minutes using AI conversation, automating tasks like product listing, copywriting, and customer service, differentiating itself from competitors by its AI-native architecture and conversational interface.

articles.title: How MGX No-Code AI Builder Supports Multi-Agent AI Projects
articles.author: Olivia Evans
articles.summary: MGX No-Code AI Builder is a new platform designed to simplify the creation of multi-agent AI systems, targeting startups and small businesses. The platform accelerates development by enabling AI agents to perform tasks in parallel, reduces expenses by lowering the need for large technical teams, and enhances collaboration by allowing non-technical members to participate. MGX aims to make multi-agent AI projects accessible to a broader range of businesses.

articles.title: Tide Makes the Biggest Upgrade to Its Liquid Detergent in 20 Years with Its Most Advanced Formula Yet
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Tide has upgraded its Original Liquid Detergent with an advanced formula. The new formula delivers tech-advanced stain removal, keeps brights brighter, whiter, and provides longer-lasting freshness of the iconic Tide scent.

articles.title: The Salad Project: Spaces concept ‘not something we're going to explore'
articles.author: Cara Houlton
articles.summary: The Salad Project initially launched its 'Spaces' click & collect service in London in April 2024, aiming to reduce customer wait times. However, co-founder James Dare has since admitted the original concept is not being explored moving forward due to issues like lack of seating and customer interaction, but the company opened its second Spaces site last month offering a different customer experience.

articles.title: Nigel Barker shakes up some espresso martinis
articles.author: Jessica Jurczak
articles.summary: The Barker Company has launched The Barker Company Espresso Martini, a ready-to-pour cocktail featuring Colombian espresso coffee, vodka, and caramelized brown sugar. The company also introduced the Cappuccino Martini, blending Wisconsin cream liquor with Colombian espresso. These Martinis follow a simple chill, shake, and pour process.

articles.title: Why these new $1,200 'sculptural' earbuds could shake up the audio market
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Bang & Olufsen introduced new premium earbuds featuring an ambitious design and top-tier audio quality. The product's features are coupled with some concerns.

articles.title: Yospace Achieves Sub-5 Second Cumulative Latency for Addressable Ad Insertion at IBC2025: A Key Innovation in Advertising Technology
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Yospace has achieved a breakthrough in live streaming technology with one-to-one addressable advertising, adding less than one second of latency, resulting in a total glass-to-glass latency of under five seconds. This innovation leverages the new MPEG-DASH Alternative Media Presentation streaming extensions and features a non-disruptive 'L-Shape' ad format. Yospace collaborated with Qualabs to integrate the system with the Shaka Player.

articles.title: I'm a tech critic – and I've found the best gaming TV
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: The LG C5 TV, an upgrade from the LG C4, features the Alpha a9 Gen 8 AI processor for enhanced brightness management and AI capabilities. Designed with gamers in mind, it offers four full-bandwidth HDMI 2.1 ports, a 144Hz refresh rate, and supports Dolby Vision and HDR10 for improved gaming experiences. The TV also includes a dedicated Game Mode with low input lag and supports variable refresh rates to eliminate screen tearing.

articles.title: Get Yourself a Smartphone Without the Distractions
articles.author: Jordan McMahon
articles.summary: The article introduces several minimalist phones, including the Light Phone III with a balance of limited distractions and core smartphone functionalities, Mudita Kompakt with an e-ink screen and Android OS for app installation, and Minimal Phone with Google Play Store and a QWERTY keyboard. Each phone offers a different approach to reducing screen time and minimizing distractions, catering to users seeking alternatives to traditional smartphones.

articles.title: No7's new viral skincare launches are here - and every product is under £15
articles.author: Emma North
articles.summary: No7 has expanded its Good Intent skincare line with six new products, including the Radiance Reflect Spray Serum, Skin Sip Eye Cream, Dream Drench Wrapping Mask, Pore Buff Clarifying Cleansing Oil, and Silky Jelly Lip Mask, all priced under £15. Additionally, Boots has launched Habi Hair and Body Mist and a Nars Beauty Icons Gift Set.

articles.title: Swisscom develops own AI chatbot for customers
articles.summary: Swisscom has developed myAI, an AI chatbot for text generation, image processing, and data analysis, hosted on AWS. The Pro version of myAI is available free until the end of 2025, and will then cost CHF 14.90 per month; the basic version will remain free.

articles.title: Xiaomi's AI-Powered Smart Home Goes Global
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Xiaomi's Mijia brand is expanding the availability of its Air Conditioner Pro Eco Series, Front Load Washer Dryer Pro 9kg, and Refrigerator Cross Door 502L.

articles.title: Heart transplant journey and poetry at City Lights
articles.summary: Apple has announced the release of the iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max, featuring a new A17 Bionic chip, titanium design, and enhanced camera system, with pre-orders starting this Friday and availability on September 22nd. The company also unveiled the Apple Watch Series 9 with a brighter display and new features, and previewed the upcoming Vision Pro headset.

articles.title: WaterWipes® Introduces Improved Wipes: Now Thicker, Softer and Twice as Strong¹
articles.author: Water Wipes
articles.summary: WaterWipes has launched its most durable wipe yet. The new and improved WaterWipes products are now twice as strong, noticeably thicker and softer, offering an effective clean while gently caring for sensitive skin. This product update enhances the cleaning experience for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Sep 24, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Sour Patch Kids introduced Soft & Chewy Candy Strips. Legendairy Milk launched Bloat Baddie, a 3-in-1 digestive support capsule. Garnier Fructis released Method for Curls, a 3-step haircare system. Unstopables launched the Unlimited Collection, in-wash scent boosters. VMI Sports unveiled Pump N' Flow Stim Free Pre-Workout Pump Liquid. Bissell released the Little Green Mini Cordless stain cleaner. Nature's Way introduced Weight Manager Drink Mix Powder. Hillshire Farm launched Sandwich Style Lunch Meats in new flavors. Fly By Jing released Classic Soy Noodles. LUNA launched a cat bed designed to blend in with home furniture.

articles.title: Cult US men's grooming brand has landed in the UK – here's how to get ...
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: Cremo distinguishes itself with its innovative shaving cream. The company is also recognized for its long-lasting scents.

articles.title: Launched in Israel: A robotic vacuum-mop that produces water from the air
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Newpan is marketing the 3I brand's S10 Ultra robotic vacuum in Israel. This vacuum features a docking station capable of recycling water and even producing water from the air.

articles.title: Herbal Oasis Expands Beyond the Southeast, Launches in Minnesota with Global Reserve Distribution
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Herbal Oasis, a hemp-derived THC-infused seltzer by cbdMD, Inc., is expanding beyond the Southeast through a distribution partnership with Global Reserve Distribution in Minnesota. This expansion introduces Oasis products to retailers across Minnesota, one of the fastest-growing THC beverage markets. The company anticipates this partnership will support their growth strategy and reflects the brand's momentum.

articles.title: Emergent raises $23M from Lightspeed to let consumers build apps
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: Emergent has launched a platform allowing non-technical users to create apps using prompts. The platform helps users through the app development process, managing APIs and deployment. Since the tool's launch last year, over 1 million people have built over 1.5 million apps.

articles.title: Boat Trader Introduces Natural Language Search: A More Powerful Way to Discover Boats and Sellers Online
articles.author: Boats Group
articles.summary: Boat Trader launched a new AI-powered natural language search feature on its marketplace. This smart search experience allows shoppers to describe what they are looking for in their own words on desktop and mobile web. The launch aims to make boat discovery more intuitive and shorten the time between research and decision.

articles.title: Emergent raises $23M from Lightspeed to let consumers build apps
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: Emergent, founded by Mukund and Madhav Jha, is developing a platform that enables non-technical users to create apps using AI powered prompts. The platform manages APIs and deployment, removing technical complexities. Emergent recently raised $23 million in Series A funding to further develop this service.

articles.title: Deals of the week: €100 off Dyson, 22% off beauty products plus Lidl Halloween essentials
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Dyson is offering €100 off the Supersonic Hair Dryer, which includes the new Flyaway attachment and five styling attachments. Lidl will be stocking Halloween costumes and decorations from September 29th. LookFantastic is running a sale with 22% off on select beauty products from brands like Sol De Janeiro, Laneige, and Olaplex.

articles.title: Limited-edition GAC Emzoom Collection SUV is priced to go
articles.author: Mark Jones
articles.summary: GAC South Africa is launching two limited edition models: the Emzoom Collection and the Emzoom Nova, both priced at R359 900. The Emzoom Nova features a turbocharged 130kW/270Nm 1.5-litre engine and comes with a refreshed grille and 17-inch alloys while the Emzoom Collection comes with 18-inch alloys and added features such as rear parking sensors and wireless Apple CarPlay. Both models come backed by a lifetime engine warranty and a two-year/30 000km service plan.

articles.title: LoopUp and Luware Enhance Customer Service with Microsoft Teams Integration
articles.summary: LoopUp enhances Microsoft Teams with secure, high-quality voice and video conferencing, featuring call recording, transcription, and analytics. Luware transforms Teams into a complete contact center with functionalities like Automatic Call Distribution (ACD), Interactive Voice Response (IVR), and real-time reporting. Combining both tools offers a unified agent desktop and improved compliance, enhancing customer experience and agent productivity.

articles.title: Andrew Yang on the launch of Noble Mobile, state of the NYC mayoral race
articles.summary: Noble Mobile, founded by Andrew Yang, launched Noble Mobile. Andrew Yang, the CEO of Noble Mobile, discussed the launch on 'Squawk Box'.

articles.title: Instabug Becomes Luciq.ai, Pioneers New Category: Agentic Mobile Observability
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Instabug transforms into Luciq.ai and launches Agentic Mobile Observability. This new category represents an AI-native platform designed to proactively detect, diagnose, and resolve mobile issues.

articles.title: Charter Next Generation Launches GreenArrow™ Matte-Finish MDO-PE Print Film
articles.author: Charter Next Generation
articles.summary: A new high-performance matte MDO-PE film offers differentiated shelf appeal and is Store Drop-Off recyclable. This new film represents an advancement in packaging materials.

articles.title: Exclusive: PDS Ventures Further Funds Refiberd
articles.author: Alexandra Harrell
articles.summary: Refiberd, a textile recycling startup, has secured additional funding and resources through an agreement with PDS Ventures. Refiberd's AI-powered technology accurately detects garment material composition, addressing a key bottleneck in sorting systems by deploying into existing recycling operations. This investment will support Refiberd's efforts to optimize the textile recycling chain.

articles.title: Perfect Corp. Brings AI Editing Agent to YouCam Perfect, Enabling Effortless and Conversational Photo Editing
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Corp. has launched the AI Editing Agent in its YouCam Perfect app. This new feature uses Vision-Language AI to enable users to edit photos through natural conversation, offering features like background removal, object erasing, and color adjustments. The AI Editing Agent is available in the latest version of YouCam Perfect for iOS.

articles.title: New-look Wawa opens in N.J. tomorrow. Check out the new design, layout.
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Wawa will open a New Jersey location tomorrow with its latest design changes. This follows two years after Wawa unveiled a prototype new look.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Expands Product Portfolio with Several New SKUs in Collaboration with North American OCS Partner
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations Inc. has expanded its product offering by launching a new seasonal pumpkin-flavored coffee pod SKU in partnership with a North American distributor. The company has already produced and distributed six pallets of this SKU across the U.S. and Canadian markets. NEXE is also developing three additional SKUs: decaf, vanilla, and bananas foster, which are expected to be introduced soon.

articles.title: 27 Cozy Products To Indulge In This Fall
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article highlights various cozy products for fall and winter, including a Barefoot Dreams throw blanket, Beckham Hotel bed pillows, a Cozy Earth pajama set, and Nodpod weighted sleep mask and blanket. It also suggests a Skims fleece loungewear set alternative, a wearable burrito blanket, and a shaggy faux-fur duvet set.

articles.title: Is the New Airwrap Worth $750?
articles.author: Dominique Pariso
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap Co-anda2x, an updated version of its hair styling tool. The Co-anda2x features a lighter design, a more powerful Hyperdymium motor, and new attachments like the AirSmooth2x straightening attachment. Dyson also introduced an accompanying app with tutorials and preset styling settings.

articles.title: A Beauty Brand Rooted in Authenticity: Introducing Narins Beauty
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Narins Beauty, founded by Narin Ammara, has launched a new beauty brand focused on self-expression. The brand emphasizes community-first creation and skincare-meets-makeup hybrids, with products available exclusively on NarinsBeauty.com.

articles.title: Ugly Dumpling Debuts Updated Menu and Signature Beer
articles.summary: Ugly Dumpling has launched a new elevated menu featuring items like Crystal Shrimp Dumplings and Fruity Yogurt Drink Bubble Tea. Additionally, Ugly Dumpling partnered with Tom's River Brewing to launch its signature beer, UGLY IPA, available at select locations and soon expanding to all locations.

articles.title: Luxury Meets Performance: Inside Purecult's Rise as India's First Premium Homecare Brand
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Purecult, India's first premium homecare label, is expanding into newer, premium categories. The company is also set to launch major brand partnerships, focusing on creating cleaning experiences crafted for the modern Indian household. Purecult emphasizes luxury, performance, science, fragrance, and design in its products.

articles.title: Google launches Mixboard: A collaborative AI tool for creative projects
articles.summary: Google has launched Mixboard, a new generative AI platform available through Google Labs, designed to help users shape and present their ideas. The platform, currently in public beta, provides a digital workspace where users can create projects using text prompts, existing visual boards, or AI-generated images. Mixboard integrates Google's image-editing model, Nano Banana, enabling users to refine visuals and generate text descriptions that match the board's content.

articles.title: AI Image Wars Intensify as ByteDance Launches Seedream 4.0, Elevating Visual Technology Competitiveness
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: ByteDance has launched Seedream 4.0, a new AI image generation model, which features enhanced photorealism, superior detail rendering, faster processing times and expanded creative control. Seedream 4.0 introduces inpainting, outpainting, style transfer, multi-subject composition, and is expected to integrate with the ByteDance ecosystem like TikTok, opening up new creative possibilities for content creators.

articles.title: New tenant prepares to open in Fort Collins' old Bed Bath & Beyond building
articles.author: Erin Udell
articles.summary: Gordon Food Service is preparing to open a new Gordon Restaurant Market in Fort Collins on November 3. The market, a foodservice distributor's venture, will also be open to the public. This opening follows the closure of a Bed Bath & Beyond location and is part of Gordon Food Service's expansion, which includes other Colorado locations in Colorado Springs and Thornton.

articles.title: New-look Wawa opens in N.J. tomorrow. Check out the new design, layout.
articles.author: N.J. News Report
articles.summary: Wawa is opening a new store in New Jersey featuring a redesigned exterior and interior, including a V-shaped steel column, wood and brick walls, and updated food and beverage displays. Additionally, Wawa is introducing a new '$6 Meal Deal' campaign, which includes a Shorti Hoagie, wrap, or chicken sandwich, a small fountain drink, and a bag of Herr's chips.

articles.title: 25 Cleaning Items With Almost Unbelievable Results
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Several new cleaning products are introduced to tackle various household cleaning challenges. The products include Bissell Stomp 'N Go stain-removing pads, The Pink Stuff cleaning paste, Tibet Almond scratch remover, Folex Carpet Spot Remover, jetted tub cleaner, Angry Orange pet odor eliminator, plant-based stainless steel cleaner, Bar Keepers Friend soft cleanser, Clorox toilet wand cleaning system, Rocco & Roxie's extreme stain and odor eliminator, Sunny & Honey Carpet Miracle, and Angry Mama microwave cleaner and dishwasher cleaner pods.

articles.title: Reviewers Say This $20 Shoe Cleaner 'Is Actual Magic' And Can Save You Money On Buying New Shoes
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: The Pink Miracle shoe cleaner kit, priced at $20, features a concentrated cleaner with saddle soap, oils, and conditioners, along with a scrubbing brush. It effectively cleans various washable fabrics, including suede, leather, and canvas, restoring shoes and saving users from buying new pairs. Reviewers praise its ability to remove stains from various shoe types and other items.

articles.title: The Best Instant Coffee That Tastes Like The Real Thing, According To Baristas
articles.author: Alexandra Emanuelli
articles.summary: The article highlights the resurgence of instant coffee, featuring several brands. Blue Bottle, acquired by Nestlé, offers single-serve sachets. Monogram, a Canadian roaster, has entered the instant coffee market with a diverse lineup. Intelligentsia, funded by Peet's Coffee & Tea, uses high-quality specialty lot coffee for its instant version.

articles.title: Yanghe Naked Bottle Liquor by Liandong Zhang and Xueqian Zhang Wins Gold in A' Packaging Design Awards
articles.author: Ein News
org: Jiangsu Yanghe Distillery Co., LtdJiangsu Yanghe Distillery Co., Ltd.
articles.summary: Yanghe Naked Bottle Liquor by Liandong Zhang and Xueqian Zhang won a Gold A' Design Award in Packaging Design. The design combines classic liquor bottle shapes with futuristic lines and retains classic elements, enhancing brand recognition for Yanghe. This recognition motivates the Yanghe team to continue striving for excellence and innovation.

articles.title: Bag MySweetSmile's most requested teeth-whitening deal before it sells out
articles.summary: An award-winning brand has relaunched its best-ever offer, allowing customers to mix and match whitening favorites. This offer encourages immediate action before it expires.

articles.title: Bridalveil Jacket
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Supply offers the Single Edge Max Razor, designed for performance and minimal environmental impact. The razor, made of recyclable aluminum and zinc, uses small blades that last about a week each. The set includes the razor, eight refill blades, and a wall mount.

articles.title: 34 Space-Saving Products For Carry-On Only Travelers
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several companies are offering new or updated travel-friendly products. Tide introduces sink packets for on-the-go laundry, while Gillette offers a compact Venus razor. Neutrogena provides a solid SPF 50 sunscreen for easy travel. Alleyoop's Pen Pal is a multi-use makeup pen and Beis offers a backpack designed for weekend getaways.

articles.title: PopUp Bagels, Philly's most anticipated new bagel shop, comes with rules and a viral TikTok following
articles.author: Beatrice Forman
articles.summary: PopUp Bagels is expanding to the Philadelphia region with its unique bagel concept: hot bagels sold in sets of three, six, or 12 with butter or cream cheese. The company's initial collaboration was with Utz, leading to a cheeseball-flavored bagel, and more schmear collaborations are planned to celebrate Philly.

articles.title: New to Trader Joe's? Here are 20 fan favorites to try at the Myrtle Beach store
articles.author: Maria Elena Scott
org: Trader Joe's Product Hall of Fame
articles.summary: Trader Joe's opened its first store in the Grand Strand on Sept. 30, featuring a variety of popular products. These products include customer favorites and award winners like Butter Chicken with Basmati Rice, Mandarin Orange Chicken, Dark Chocolate Peanut Butter Cups, and Chili & Lime Flavored Rolled Corn Tortilla Chips.

articles.title: Amazon to shut checkout-free UK grocery shops
articles.author: Afp Afp
articles.summary: Amazon will launch a same-day fresh product delivery service next year.

articles.title: Diwali upgrades for every family! Washing machines at 55% off, instant discounts with exchange offers and GST drops
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: Several washing machine brands like Godrej, IFB, LG, and Samsung are offering discounts and deals on their products during the Diwali season through the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale and Amazon Diwali Sale. Discounts of up to 55% are available on various models of washing machines with features like AI technology, inverter technology, and multiple wash cycles. These offers provide a limited-time opportunity to purchase efficient laundry solutions at discounted prices.

articles.title: ​Focus On Low & No Alcohol: 1 November
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: Major UK beverage brands are focusing on zero-alcohol variants, driving growth through product development and marketing. The industry is seeing innovation in low and no-alcohol options, with a focus on improving product quality and exploring new trends. The Grocer plans to profile four new products or ranges in this sector.

articles.title: Alibaba Cloud Announces International Expansion Plans to Power the Next-Generation AI Innovations
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: Companies are launching new data centers and service centers. These centers aim to enhance infrastructure coverage. This expansion addresses growing global demand for AI and Cloud services.

articles.title: ZUS COFFEE Launches NGUPI®️ Can – Malaysia's Kopi, Anytime, Anywhere
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: ZUS COFFEE has launched ZUS NGUPI®️ Can, a ready-to-drink coffee inspired by Malaysian kopitiam culture, available in four flavors: Klasik, Kopi Tarik, Kopi Coklat, and White Coffee. The product will be available at major retailers nationwide and online, with plans for international expansion, and is expected to contribute significantly to the company's revenue.

articles.title: Kong Kong Food, which makes handmade yuba (dried tofu skin) only with domestic soybeans, hosted live..
articles.author: Lee Yu-Jin
org: Korea Small and Medium Venture Business Distribution Service
articles.summary: Kong Kong Food experienced a significant sales increase after hosting a live commerce event for their handmade yuba, generating over 10 million won in sales in one hour. This was facilitated by a government support project that assists small businesses in producing and operating live commerce broadcasts. Han Yu-won plans to support live commerce production to a total of 1,500 small businesses this year as well.

articles.title: Rites Foods excites beverages market with new enriched product
articles.author: Chuka Uroko
articles.summary: Rite Foods Limited has launched Bigi Flex Sausage Roll, a new snack product targeting Gen Z and young adults. Bigi Flex aims to provide a bold, unique beefy taste and is positioned as a snack-on-the-go option. Rite Foods emphasizes its commitment to innovation and consumer satisfaction through this new product launch.

articles.title: Tizeti bets on AI to redefine internet service in Nigeria, Ghana
articles.author: Royal Ibeh
articles.summary: Tizeti Network Limited has launched its "New & Awesome Deal" across Nigeria and Ghana. This initiative leverages AI to enhance the customer experience by streamlining payments and providing unprecedented control to users. Starting October 1 for fiber customers, October 15 for wireless Wi-Fi users, and November 1 for subscribers in Ghana, the NA Deal introduces a suite of AI-powered tools which provide connection health, account status, and device performance directly from their smartphones.

articles.title: Can Oppo's latest A6 Pro 5G smartphone withstand the weight of two firemen?
articles.author: Angelin Yeoh
articles.summary: Oppo launched its A6 Pro 5G smartphone, featuring a 6,500mAh battery, 80w SuperVooc fast-charging, and AGC DT-Star D+ Crystal Shield Glass. Priced at RM1,199, the phone is available with 8GB RAM and 256GB ROM in Coral Pink and Stellar Blue.

articles.title: OnePlus Pad 3 review: The goldilocks tablet
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the Pad 3 tablet with a focus on delivering premium performance at a competitive price of Rs 49,999. The Pad 3 features a 13.2-inch LCD display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, and a large 12,140mAh battery with 80W SuperVOOC charging.  Additionally, OnePlus offers an optional Smart Keyboard case for Rs 16,999 to enhance productivity.

articles.title: Qualcomm Enhances Content Supply Chain with Adobe GenStudio's Generative AI Capabilities
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Qualcomm has partnered with Adobe to integrate Adobe GenStudio into its content supply chain to leverage generative AI for content production. This integration will accelerate marketing collateral creation, enhance product documentation, personalize customer experiences, and adapt content for different languages. The goal is to improve efficiency, scalability, personalization, consistency, and time-to-market for Qualcomm's content efforts.

articles.title: Kingston Technology supports the Middle East's Digital Surge with Next-Gen Storage Solutions
articles.summary: Kingston Technology is providing reliable, high-performance storage and memory solutions to support the growing gaming and digital content creation community in the Middle East. Their XS2000, XS1000, and KC3000 SSDs, DDR5 memory upgrades, and FURY Renegade SSD offer speed and convenience for various devices and demanding workflows, aiming to empower creators and gamers.

articles.title: Alibaba Cloud Announces International Expansion Plans to Power the Next-Generation AI Innovations
articles.author: Morning Sun
articles.summary: Alibaba Cloud plans to launch its first data centers and service centers. These new facilities are designed to enhance infrastructure coverage and address the growing global demand for AI and Cloud services. The goal is to fuel innovations in full-stack AI and Cloud capabilities together with global partners and customers.

articles.title: Fire-Bolttâs sibling founders launch FireLens, bringing AI-powered smart eyewear to a global stage.
articles.author: SPOTLIGHT
articles.summary: Fire-Boltt has launched FireLens, an AI-powered smart eyewear designed for hands-free navigation, calls, and real-time updates. This product aims to blend AI into eyewear, creating a seamless integration of technology into everyday life, appealing to a generation valuing intelligence and style.

articles.title: Bowers & Wilkins Px8 S2 review: headphones heaven
articles.summary: Bowers & Wilkins launched the PX8 S2 headphones, featuring a savvy redesign, internal sonic upgrades, and luxurious materials like Nappa leather and aluminum. The PX8 S2 includes features such as exposed cabling, a slimmer design, a new headphone amplifier, aptX Lossless support, Bluetooth 5.3, a new 5-band EQ, and upgraded noise-cancelling with more microphones.

articles.title: ZTE nubia Lunches nubia A36 in Pakistan – 'Price Kam, Feature Zyada'
articles.author: Publishing Partner
articles.summary: ZTE's sub-brand nubia has launched the nubia A36 smartphone in Pakistan at a launch price of PKR 18,999. The phone features a 6.75-inch HD+ display, 12GB of Dynamic RAM, a 5000mAh battery, and a 13MP AI dual camera system, and is available through official retailers and online platforms across Pakistan.

articles.title: Leapmotor T03 review: New city car delivers on function, but is it fun?
articles.author: Michael Mcaleer
articles.summary: Leapmotor has launched its T03 electric city car in Ireland, managed by Gowan Autos, with a starting price of €18,950. The T03 features a 37kWh battery, a range of 265km, and is equipped with alloys, a panoramic roof, a rear-view camera, and a 10-inch digital touchscreen. This introduction aims to offer a value-driven option in the competitive EV market.

articles.title: Nominations Open for Fourth Annual Digital Engineering Awards Presented by L&T Technology Services, ISG & CNBC-TV18
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: L&T Technology Services has launched the fourth annual Digital Engineering Awards in partnership with Information Services Group (ISG). The awards recognize excellence in digital engineering.

articles.title: AI powers new growth for Bolton ed-tech firm Near-Life
articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.summary: Near-Life, an educational tech firm, has developed AI-powered virtual characters to enhance its interactive digital learning content. With support from the GM Business Growth Hub, this innovation aims to create personalized learning experiences without coding, leading to a projected 100% increase in customer numbers.

articles.title: Ooredoo Kuwait's iPhone 17 Launch Event Sets the Bar High with Unprecedented Success
articles.summary: Ooredoo Kuwait launched the iPhone 17 series with an event at Ooredoo Tower, offering exclusive bundles, unlimited internet, calls, and social media access. The iPhone 17 Pro Max in orange was particularly popular, and Ooredoo provides trade-in programs and exclusive offers, including special deals for Al-Nokhba customers and partnerships with Chips, Jahez, and NBK. The iPhone 17 series is available at Ooredoo retail branches and online, with monthly plans starting from KD 25.

articles.title: Revolutionary Connected Smartwatch: Achieves Three Weeks of Battery Life Unmatched in the Market
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Watch GT 6 Series, a new smartwatch boasting up to three weeks of battery life. Key features include precise GPS, continuous heart rate monitoring, sleep analysis, NFC payments, and Bluetooth 5.3 for efficient connectivity. The watch is available starting at €249.99 with additional launch offers.

articles.title: Sharge's Disk Pro external SSD is unlike anything I've used yet
articles.author: Harish Jonnalagadda
articles.summary: Sharge has launched the Disk Pro, a new external SSD available on Kickstarter. It features up to 4TB of storage, an integrated USB-C cable, active cooling, HDMI and USB-A ports, and magnets for attaching to phones. The Disk Pro functions as both an external SSD and a portable dock.

articles.title: AI agents collapse the wall between marketing and CX
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever (HUL) is launching AI-enabled skin and hair analysers, virtual try-ons, and AR-guided tutorials for its beauty brands to drive personalised experiences. Zepto is introducing Zepto Atom, an AI suite that creates consumer personas to enable marketers to run interactive sessions with virtual customers and deploy campaigns in real time.

articles.title: BizCover & Lyka Turn To Jaywing To Future Proof Organic Search Strategies
articles.author: Oliver Cerovic
articles.summary: Jaywing has extended its partnership with BizCover and started work with Lyka to enhance their online presence through SEO, digital PR, and AI optimization. BizCover is investing in Digital PR to boost its domain authority and SEO performance, while Lyka is working with Jaywing to strengthen its visibility in search and explore growth opportunities through organic channels.

articles.title: Can audacious ice cream startup Hocco hit Rs 500 crore in sales this year?
articles.author: Sreekant Khandekar 24
articles.summary: Hocco, a new ice cream brand in India, is challenging established players by offering innovative products at competitive price points. The company launched with a 50,000-liter per day plant, scaling up to 350,000 liters for the following summer. Hocco focuses on social media and digital marketing, projecting their products as the hero and launching new initiatives, like a mithai-based ice cream in collaboration with an FMCG brand, to target diverse consumer segments.

articles.title: Xiaomi's AI-Powered Smart Home Goes Global
articles.author: Paul Lamkin
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching its first wave of Mijia major appliances outside of China, including the Mijia Air Conditioner Pro Eco Series (€599), Mijia Front Load Washer Dryer Pro 9kg (€579), and Mijia Refrigerator Cross Door 502L (€849).  The company also introduced the 5Pro robot vacuum cleaner (€799) and the C701 4K security camera (under €60), with AI capabilities, expanding its 'Human × Car × Home' ecosystem.

articles.title: Chemists and Druggists Asscn seek protection period for shifting to new GST
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Google announced the Pixel 9, featuring a new camera system with AI-powered photo editing and extended battery life. The launch date is October 25th.

articles.title: Logitech's new solar-powered keyboard can last 4 months in complete darkness on a single charge ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Logitech launched the Signature Slim Solar+ K980 keyboard.

articles.title: Xiaomi launched two new smartphones in Munich to rival Samsung
articles.author: Cryptopolitan
articles.summary: Xiaomi, a Chinese technology company, unveiled a new smartphone lineup in Munich. The collection includes two models, positioning them to compete with Samsung in global markets.

articles.title: Avocado Grand Luxe Review: I Tested A $22,000+ Bed To See If It's Worth The Cost
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Avocado has released a new high-end mattress called the Grand Luxe, starting at $8,499. A review explores the pros and cons of this new product to determine its value.

articles.title: Search Live Available On Android And iPhone: Google's AI Mode Sees What You See And ...
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Google is launching Search Live within the Google and Google Lens apps. This new feature enables users to utilize AI to analyze their surroundings and converse with AI Mode.

articles.title: New to Trader Joe's? Here are 20 fan favorites to try at the Myrtle Beach store
articles.author: The Sun News
articles.summary: Trader Joe's has opened a new store in the Myrtle Beach area. The store features 20 products with cult followings, offering these products to a new customer base.
